title: chandrachooDa
sahitya:
shankaraabharaNam



29 dheera shankaraabharaNam mela

Aa: S R2 G3 M1 P D2 N3 S

Av: S N3 D2 P M1 G3 R2 S  



candracUDa! shiva! sha.nkara! pArvatI ramaNanE! ninage

namO namO!

sundara mriga dhara! pinAka dhanukara gangA

shira! gajacarma ambaradhara!



anupallavi shankaraabharaNam 



nandi vAhana Anandadinda mUr jagadi mereva nInE andu

amR.ta

ghaTTadinda udisida viSha tandu bhujisidava nInE



caraNam 1 sunaada vinOdini 



65 mEca kalyaaNi janya

Aa: S G3 M2 D2 N3 S

Av: S N3 D2 M2 G3 S 



kandarpana krodhadinda kaN teredu konda ugranu nInE

indirEsha shrI ramana

nAmava candadi pogaLuva nInE



caraNam 2 tODi 



8 hanumatODi mEla

Aa: S R1 G2 M1 P D1 N2 S

Av: S N2 D1 P M1 G2 R1 S 



bAlamruganDana kAlanu eLevAga pAlisidava nInE kAlakUTavanu

pAnamADida nIlakanThanu nInE



caraNam 3 kamaas 



28 harikaambhOji janya

Aa: S M1 G3 M1 P D2 N2 S

Av: S N2 D2 P M1 G3 R2 S



valayadi kapAla piDidu bhikShe bEdO digambara nInE

jAla mADida

gOpAlanemba heNNige maruLAdava nInE



caraNam 4



kamaas 



dharege dakShiNa kAveri tIra kumbhapura vAsanu nInE



tODi 



karadalli vINeya gAnava mADuva uraga bhUShana nInE



sunaada vinOdini 



koraLali bhasma rudrAkShava dharisida parama vaiShNava

nInE



shankaraabharaNam 



garudagamana shrI purandara viTTalage prANa priyanu

nInE
